summary: Simple mod that makes silver weapons way more valuable.
descriptionHtml:
Given the expensiveness of crafting these items,it was always kind of annoying to me that you could get more selling the individual materials than you could crafting and selling them.
Well,that's no longer a problem!Silver swords now have a value of 1,200 (rather than the vanilla 100) and silver greatswords are worth 2.400 (rather than vanilla 160).
If you have a weapons mod you would like to make a patch for, feel free. If you don't want to be hassled with it, comment the mods name and I may make a patch for it.

This is only the begining of my mods. I have a lot of ideas I want to see through. If you would use my adfly link to help,I'd greatly appreciate it![url=http://bit.ly/1O2nKel]
http://bit.ly/1O2nKel
[/url]
Very simple to install manually; just drop it into your Skyrim data folder.
author: yokin128
